verses.roman:
ācārya kahe--nā kariba sannyāsi-nimantraṇa
sannyāsī nāśila mora saba smṛti-dharma

synonyms: ācārya kahe—Advaita Ācārya said; nā kariba—I shall never do; sannyāsi-nimantraṇa—invitation to the sannyāsīs; sannyāsī—a sannyāsī; nāśila—has spoiled; mora—My; saba—all; smṛti-dharma—regulative principles of the smṛti-śāstra.
translation: Advaita Ācārya replied, "I shall never again invite another sannyāsī, for it is a sannyāsī who has spoiled all My brahminical smṛti regulations."
